locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ sweet. The manager at this pilot deserves a raise because she's the only one I've ever seen working. I mean a few workers have been ok but since 10 years ago when they lost the world's best shower cleaner it went downhill until the remodel.

Bathrooms are disgusting!!!
I took a shower there last night shower was pretty clean but the bathroomsüò± you can tell nobody's done anything all night long!! ‚Ä¶

Hey I wanted to say thank you to David (your shower attendant). Great job making a Customer feel like you care. I didn't take a shower today but I'll tell you a based on the way he carries himself I'm going to assume the showers are ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . Of course there was much less spots before I left at 4am, but I got a close up spot, close to the WiFi, that was decent. Bathrooms were clean enough at the time, and shower was small but clean. Employees were friendly, and McD's was good.

The speaker volume for showers call is really too low, this causes to much delays, the only way to catch you shower is to keep your eyes sticked on that screen, this is one more weak Pilot as usual. I asked to cancel my shower, I'm going to ‚Ä¶

Took a shower, paid $12 cash for it, the drain was clogged in shower# 3, there was 2 inches of water in the shower the whole time I was showering and they had no other clean shower available. The only reason I gave them 3 stars was because ‚Ä¶

Very good place for quick stop shop. You will find what you need in it from shampoos to t-shirts, to shaving needs, and even if u need to take a shower, they have rooms for this purpose. It's a very good place for long drive rest.

Great parking layout, lots of spots and room to navigate! Only negative was the shower room I had was dirty, sunflower seed shells behind the door with other dirt, toilet hadn't been cleaned in awhile.
‚Ä¶ Lots of showers ‚Ä¶
Staff was friendly (to all it's patrons)! Store/restroom/shower was clean! Tons of parking throughout the night (may change when the snow flys)!

locations.title: Dundee Travel Center
locations.content: Dundee Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I was surprised it was a truck stop when I rolled up. I went for a shower. You get a room to yourself, they clean between guests, and the water was wonderfully warm. It would have been a bit nicer if there was a coat rack, a mat to stand on ‚Ä¶

No showers and bathrooms since covid............. my jaw dropped, honestly. Don't shower because there is imaginary covid. No subs either. Good thing there is parking, because if someone said there is no parking because covid, I'd have ‚Ä¶

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Showers were clean. Nice place to park with a tim Hortons, fazolis, and popeyes. Staff seemed friendly. Only issue was the shower had low pressure and the temperature constantly fluctuated while you were showering. It would go from freezing cold to scolding hot (no in between)

It's not bad at all . The employees and managers are way cool .I have spent 90 day in the parking lot.  On my travels.  The prices are everything not bad . Shower 17 bucks same everywhere better then most .. I'd like to say too the travels.  Don't F up the parking lot.  With trash the employees are way cool . Just letting you stay .

Thank you Hailey and Joey.
In and out in no time.
Clean and convenient location. ‚Ä¶

The bathroom was dirty. I know it's memorial day but somebody has to do their job please. Hourly courtesy checks would go a long way. Especially when clean bathrooms should be a focal point of your business platform. Not one toilet was presentable.

The restroom was not clean. Trash cans overflowing onto the floor. A paper towel dispenser was empty. When I went up to the cash register to pay there was no cashier. Myself and another customer waited 2 minutes before the cashier that was talking to another employee in Tim Horton finally walked over to help us.

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Shower is great. They quickly clean up for next customer. I wish if there was one more loves near by so that this store can reduce the long line up for fueling. Hats off to the staff for keeping their sanity and providing great customer ‚Ä¶
Not clean shower, need stand in line 60 min

Hardly any parking at 2pm, at 3am there was a lengthy wait for a shower, shower was full of mold, cell service (with a major carrier) is trash here, and the fuel pumps are extremely slow. Terrible Loves but not really sure what I was ‚Ä¶
Shower was luke warm at best during the day , had 2 hour wait time.... Showers get shut down during the night. Bathroom filthy, this is a homeless shelter not a Loves...
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 836 reviews ¬∑ 963 photos
Great but one problem. There is elephant in pipes near shower #1 .Beware
Good people working here, had to wait a little bit for a shower, but it's normal for the weekends.. But no laundry room!.. They said something has to do with the TWP approval.. Doesn't make sense.

I paid $16 Dollars for a shower after waiting 40 mins I decided to ask for a refund and the staff made it seem like that wasn‚Äôt possible but rescheduled it for me in the evening. I went back in the evening 10/9/2022 at 11:59pm because I ‚Ä¶
Don't use shower #3. Lukewarm water. Told manager about the issue,  and she just huffed and walked away.  After that experience,  I'll be trying Pilot across the street

Corporate Love‚Äôs Executives PLEASE train your employees how to properly clean shower stalls - step by step and with pictures; how to keep shelves stocked; how to clean restrooms - again step by step and with pictures; AND PLEASE for the ‚Ä¶

Best Loves on the road.
I love the new concept store they need to build all the new ones like this, coffee restaurant shower laundry and shop in 1 convenient place and lots of parking.  Now you are on to something Loves, keep it up.

Stopped in to get some fuel grab a shower and do a load of laundry also ate at Fazolis pretty good for fast food italian while waiting on laundry to dry noticed how hard the girl Jennifer cleaning the showers never stopped was busy running ‚Ä¶

Hello everyone got here to take shower and fins a parking I use rv parking or Bob tail and they have few spots here plus showers not 100% clean but 95% is pretty good  and shower water and head is pretty good compare to some places
Good selection of items but the shower was broken. Water came out cold and low pressure.
No shower cleaning person on a Monday morning....so no showers, but they enforce the overnight paid parking. ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Guy from the Repair shop found me asking for shower and he thought I was was soliciting or some kind of stuff said something and I got a shower right away from a fellow driver. ‚Ä¶

The store and restrooms was ok. Shower didn't have much pressure and only 3 of the 7 dryers worked. Rest were out of order. Only close by parking to store was reserved but lots of parking if you like to walk a ways to the store part.

Last time I stopped there the restaurant was still open. The shower was good. You can take your Tim Hortons,  Fazio 's and Popeyes  and stick it where the sun don't shine. I am staying with cracker barrel  and Dennys.

Shower was clean, good water pressure,hot, nice TA inside if you can make the hike theres a game room,nice store,tv room, laundry and nicely decorated place. I'm impressed for the area. Thanks TA for making a nice safe place for us!

showerReviews.reviewText: Paid $10 for a cold shower. Foreign guy behind the counter was going to refund my money but I told him I was staying overnight, and that we would even up on it. Ate dinner, waitress "got distracted and forgot my order". Went back to the ‚Ä¶
Parking lot is a swamp in the back row... Better bring your own towel for shower..but big beer cave. And hot food most of the day.

‚Ä¶ understanding of our situation. She offered a couch for us to sleep on, a shower, towels & food for our entire 2 day stay until we could get some one to come trailer us off the premisis and back home to MI. During this stay the staff ‚Ä¶
Nice family owned business. Not your typical big chain truck stops. Nicely priced shower, and laundry facilities.

showerReviews.reviewText: I was working close by there getting done late and wanting to go Doordaah... I stopped here they have $5 showers and both Bathroom and Shower area are Super Clean!!! I appreciate that!!! Staff on the late shift are Awesome!! üòé ‚Ä¶
Shower was very dirty sewer gas coming up through the drain in floor sink would not drain and was full of hair hot water only lasted about 7 minutes i guess that's what u get for 5 dollars
The last post a month ago nothing changed same nasty shower and restroom
Great place to shower
It's good. Not huge. Chicken but the pizza shop is closed down. No restaurant. One shower, with towels. Scale, not CAT scale. C store, standard gas station stuff.
Great workers here, great , fantastic even Shower(s)here too. Very helpful workers that are here.small place, but decent small, not TOO Small however. Great place to be ...
love the People who work there, They have a beautiful great Shower here, $5.3o.per.
Parking, less expensive fuel, food and shower.  Good place to stop for the night!
Cheap clean $5 shower no towels

locations.title: Petro 388 Travel Center
locations.content: Petro 388 Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Lots of truck and RV parking! Apparently they have a no charge RV station, which is great, because some places charge you. The store was clean and had a good selection of food. There is also a sit down restaurant.  The lady behind the counter was friendly. I would definitely come here again.

Shower was fairly clean but the water would fluctuate from cold to warm. Never got hot. Shower #2. Very disappointing shower experience. Parking was good. At 8:30pm there were still a good amount of spots for a Wednesday. Friendly staff.

This place is probably one of the worst Petro s&g TA I been to very very dirty and the staff is rude I used to shop there and fill up but now I go to loves across the street which is much friendlier and cleaner

Wow! The new owners LV Petroleum have made so many changes to this location, and it is AMAZING! The store and shop have both been remodeled and updated. There is a better selection of food and amenities. The showers and bathrooms are very ‚Ä¶
Good selection, clean inside. We got candy and an icee :) Mack rang us up and she was great! Very nice and helpful

Clean restrooms and very clean showers. Roomy driver's Lounge and clean laundry room. The Petro has your standard hot and cold foods and drinks. They did have a few things that I don't normally see like specialty dog treats and local wines.

For the employees who are employed, they are nice. The restrooms could use however a high pressure fire hose, with bleach. The restaurant closes at 7 pm. Come on ! A Waffle House survives with 1 cook , chief bottle washer and a server. The ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Apparently people don't know this place because there was almost empty on the pretty big parking lot. Nice, clean truck stop.  Free shower and coffee with over 50 gallons. The lady on fuel desk was nice and friendly.  5 stars

‚Ä¶ restaurant on freeway 24 in Napoleon Ohio exit 41 truck stop fuel king food was verry good verry nice  People i Order chana batura it was So delicious and restaurant was so clean Restaurants clean And they have clean  a shower also ...
Clean hot shower, good sit down restaurant, much better than the 2 truckstops across the highway.
